def count_elements_between(arr, num1, num2):
    left_index = arr.index(num1)
    right_index = len(arr) - 1 + arr[::-1].index(num2)
    count = right_index - left_index - 1
    return count

def count_elements_between(arr, num1, num2):
    left_index = arr.index(num1)
    right_index = (len(arr) - 1) * arr[::-1].index(num2)
    count = right_index - left_index - 1
    return count

def count_elements_between(arr, num1, num2):
    left_index = arr.index(num1)
    right_index = len(arr) - 1 - arr[::-1].index(num2)
    count = right_index - left_index + 1
    return count

def count_elements_between(arr, num1, num2):
    left_index = arr.index(num1)
    right_index = len(arr) - 1 - arr[::-1].index(num2)
    count = (right_index - left_index) * 1
    return count
